SEARCH

Interface gameUtilities

public interface gameUtilities
Interface gameUtilities defines the methods that must be implemented by a game utilities class.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • loadMap

      String[][] loadMap() throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads the game map from given file.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the game map file does not exist.

    • printMatrix

      void printMatrix(String[][] gameMap)
      Prints the game map to the console.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.

    • move_up

      String[][] move_up(String[][] gameMap) throws IOException
      Moves the player up one tile/room on the game map.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated game map.

    • move_down

      String[][] move_down(String[][] gameMap) throws IOException
      Moves the player down one tile/room on the game map.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated game map.

    • move_left

      String[][] move_left(String[][] gameMap) throws IOException
      Moves the player left one tile/room on the game map.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated game map.

      String[][] move_right(String[][] gameMap) throws IOException
      Moves the player right one tile/room on the game map.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated game map.

    • spawnUser

      String[][] spawnUser(String[][] gameMap)
      Spawns the user at the start of the game map.
      Parameters:
      gameMap - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map with the user spawned at the start of the game map.

    • getCurrentPosition

      int[] getCurrentPosition()
      Gets the current position of the user on the game map.
      Returns:
      An array of two integers representing the user's current x and y coordinates on the game map.

    • count_playtime

      int count_playtime(long start, long end)
      Calculates the total playtime of the user.
      Parameters:
      start - The start time of the game.
      end - The end time of the game.
      Returns:
      The total playtime in seconds.

    • createUser

      void createUser(String username, String firstName, String lastName, String state, String lastSignIn, String logInTime, String pin, String dateOfBirth, String city, String zip, String totalPlayTime) throws IOException
      Creates a new user account.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the new user account.
      firstName - The first name of the new user.
      lastName - The last name of the new user.
      state - The state of residence of the new user.
      lastSignIn - The last sign-in time of the new user.
      logInTime - The current log-in time of the new user.
      pin - The PIN of the new user.
      dateOfBirth - The date of birth of the new user.
      city - The city of residence of the new user.
      zip - The zip code of residence of the new user.
      totalPlayTime - The total playtime of the new user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the new user account to a file.

    • searchUser

      boolean searchUser(String userName)
      Searches for a user account based on their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user account to search for.
      Returns:
      True if the user account exists, false otherwise.

    • updateAndSaveMap

      String[][] updateAndSaveMap(String userName, int[] userPosition) throws IOException
      Updates the game map with the user's new position and saves it to a file.
      Parameters:
      userName - The users username.
      userPosition - The new position of the user on the game map.
      Returns:
      The updated game map.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the updated game map to a file.

    • saveMap

      void saveMap(String[][] map, String filename) throws IOException
      Saves the game map to a file.
      Parameters:
      map - The 2D array of strings representing the game map.
      filename - The name of the file to save the game map to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the game map to a file.

    • searchPin

      boolean searchPin(String user, int pin)
      Searches for a user's PIN in the user records.
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the user whose PIN to search for.
      pin - The PIN to search for.
      Returns:
      true if the PIN is found, false otherwise.

    • tokenTheUser

      void tokenTheUser() throws IOException
      Tokens the user by creating a new token and saving it to a file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the new token to a file.

    • saveUserToFile

      void saveUserToFile(user newUser) throws IOException
      Saves the given user object to a file.
      Parameters:
      newUser - The user object to save to a file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error saving the user object to a file.

    • getInstance

      utilities getInstance()
      Gets the instance of the game utilities class.
      Returns:
      The instance of the game utilities class.

    • getUser_records

      HashMap<String,user> getUser_records()
      Gets the hashmap of user records.
      Returns:
      The hashmap of user records.
